description: Oakbrook Community Farm, established by the Biodynamic Land Trust, aims to promote biodynamic farming while fostering community connections with food and nature. Operating on a 42-acre site, the farm utilizes a community benefit society model, leasing land to various tenants who adhere to biodynamic principles. The initiative focuses on sustainable agriculture, education, and social care, creating a supportive environment for local food initiatives and enhancing community well-being through therapeutic practices.
name: Oakbrook Farm
